meanings.definition: Not typical or characteristic of a particular group or category.
meanings.sent1: The purple elephant was nonrepresentative of the usual gray ones.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior at the party was nonrepresentative of her usual shyness.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog was nonrepresentative of the other silent pets.
meanings.sent4: The bright red sky was nonrepresentative of the typical blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The giant snowflake was nonrepresentative of the small, delicate ones.

meanings.definition: Not serving as a representative or delegate.
meanings.sent1: The nonrepresentative member did not attend the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The substitute teacher was nonrepresentative of the school's usual staff.
meanings.sent3: The silent alarm clock was nonrepresentative of the loud ones.
meanings.sent4: The lone wolf was nonrepresentative of the pack mentality.
meanings.sent5: The fake crown was nonrepresentative of the true royal jewels.

meanings.definition: Not accurately portraying or reflecting something.
meanings.sent1: The blurry photo was nonrepresentative of the clear view.
meanings.sent2: The distorted mirror was nonrepresentative of her true reflection.
meanings.sent3: The broken compass was nonrepresentative of the accurate ones.
meanings.sent4: The faded painting was nonrepresentative of the vibrant original.
meanings.sent5: The scratched mirror was nonrepresentative of the flawless glass.
